name: nexdh
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wex(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(w1)), wn(wex(s0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wex(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(w1)), wn(wex(s0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wn(w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wex(s0, w1)))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(w1)), wn(wex(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wn(w1))

|- wi(w0, wn(wex(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wn(w1))

comment: Deduction for generalization rule for negated wff. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2002.)
